amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Special Purpose Marine Air Ground Task Force-Crisis Response by $10 million and reduces funding to the Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $11 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 113-170 to increase funding for the Special Purpose Marine Air Ground Task Force-Crisis Response by $10 million and reduce funding to the Operations and Maintenance, Defense-Wide account by $11 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Walberg.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Walberg amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
